public class ServerGameThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerGameThread

      public ServerGameThread​(Server server, java.net.Socket clientSocket, java.lang.Integer orderOfConnection)
      Constructor for the thread that will manage the clientSocket until the game starts. This thread is created to manage clients initialization (insertion of nickname and number of players).
      Parameters:
      server - Server
      clientSocket - (client' socket to manage)
      orderOfConnection - (order in which the ClientCLI has connected to the Server)

    • ServerGameThread

      public ServerGameThread​(Server server, java.util.ArrayList<ClientHandler> waitingClients)
      Constructor for the thread that will create the game. This ServerGameThread is created when the required number of players has been reached in the waiting room and it will take over the game.
      Parameters:
      server - Server
      waitingClients - (Clients who will play the game)

  • Method Details

    • getSgtClients

      public static java.util.ArrayList<ClientHandler> getSgtClients()

    • getManagedClient

      public ClientHandler getManagedClient()

    • getClientNickname

      public java.lang.String getClientNickname()

    • getOrderOfConnection

      public int getOrderOfConnection()

    • isConnectionAvailable

      public static boolean isConnectionAvailable()

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Method to create all the components necessary to play and finally launch the game. At the end of the game, if everything is successful, it will reset the game, so it can start a new one.

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
      Method to reset the game (model and server, to be able to accept new connections). Game reset can occur if the game ends, if a player takes too much time to perform an action or if a disconnection occurs. In these cases, a message will be sent to the players and the server reset will be called.

    • reactivateConnectionState

      public static void reactivateConnectionState()
      Method to make the connection to the game available. It is called by the Server after a reset.

    • run

      public void run()
      Method executed by threads that manage clients.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • settingClient

      public void settingClient()
      Method to welcome the client, ask for his name and the number of players if he is the first to connect, make him ready to play and put him on hold until the Server has reached the number of players needed to play.

    • send

      public void send​(ClientHandler clientHandler, java.lang.Object object)
      Method to send an object to a Client.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - (reference to the client concerned)
      object - to send

    • read

      public java.lang.Object read​(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Method to receive an object from a Client. The method contains a timer to avoid waiting too long and to understand if a disconnection has occurred.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - (reference to the client concerned)
      Returns:
      receivedObject
